You might also consider consulting with your veterinarian to discuss Max's progress and get their recommendation on continuing the supplement. They may have some insights on the best course of treatment or suggest any adjustments to his regimen.

Additionally, you could also consider other ways to support Max's joint health, such as:

* Providing a comfortable and supportive bed for him to sleep on
* Encouraging gentle exercise, such as short walks or slow playtime, to help maintain his mobility
* Managing his weight to reduce stress on his joints
* Considering physical therapy or massage to help improve his mobility and reduce pain

Remember, every dog is different, so it's great that you're taking a proactive approach to managing Max's arthritis. By working with your veterinarian and making a few lifestyle adjustments, you can help Max feel more comfortable and enjoy a better quality of life.
